  for (i = 0; i < $gameParty.battleMembers().length; i++) {
    obj = $gameParty.battleMembers()[i];
    if (obj !== user) obj.removeState(12);
  }
} else {
  for (i = 0; i < $gameTroop._enemies.length; i++) {
    obj = $gameTroop._enemies[i];
    if (obj !== user) obj.removeState(12);

}

name: Confused
note:
<Category: debuff>
<Category: weak debuff>

<Custom Action Start Effect>
// Calculate the confusion success rate
var confuseRate = 0.50;
// Check RNG if it passed
if (Math.random() < confuseRate) {
  // Get the confusion skill for the user to perform
  var confusionSkill = 62;
  // Start the animation
  user.startAnimation(63);
  // Get the user's current action
  var action = user.currentAction();
  // Set it to the confusion skill
  action.setSkill(confusionSkill);
}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

<Help Description>
This battler has a 50% chance of accidentally attacking itself.

</Custom Battle Effect>

var n = this._toxicCounter / 20;

user.gainHp(value);
this._toxicCounter += 1;
this.startAnimation(59);
</Custom Regenerate Effect>

name: Blood Boost
note:
<Category: buff>

<Custom Establish Effect>
// Check if Beast Boost hasn't been applied yet and if the target is dead or the target's HP is 0
if (!this._beastBoostApplied && (target.isDead() || target.hp <= 0)) {
  // Enable the Beast Boost flag
  this._beastBoostApplied = true;
  // Get the parameter ID to be boosted to be ATK
  var boostParam = 2;
  // Loop through ATK, DEF, MAT, MDF, AGI, and LUK parameters
  for (var i = 3; i < 6; ++i) {
    // Check if the looped parameter is the highest
    if (user.param(i) > user.param(boostParam)) {
      // Set the boosted parameter to the currently looped parameter
      boostParam = i;
    }
  }
  // Set the number of turns for the buff
  var turns = 5;
  // Buff the attacker
  user.addBuff(boostParam, turns);
  user.addBuff(boostParam, turns);
  user.addBuff(boostParam, turns);
  // Play an animation on the attacker
  user.startAnimation(51);
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

<Help Description>
Defeating an enemy will increase this battler's ATK, DEF, MAT, or MDF, whichever stat is the highest.
</Help Description>

name: Soul Shackles
note:
<Category: debuff>
<Category: moderate debuff>

<animationRow:25>

<Custom Regenerate Effect>
// Check if the original caster isn't the target and that the original target is alive.
if (origin !== target && origin.isAlive()) {
  // Determine the damage dealt.
  var damage = target.mhp / 16;
  // Round up the damage.
  damage = Math.ceil(damage);
  // Cap the damage to 500.
  cap = Math.ceil(origin.mhp / 5);
  damage = Math.min(cap, damage);
  // Play the healing animation on the original caster.
  origin.startAnimation(46);
  // Original caster gains HP.
  origin.gainHp(damage);
  // Show the HP gained.
  origin.customPopup("+" + damage, 1);
  // Clears the original caster's HP popup.
  origin.clearResult();
  // Play the poison animation on the target.
  target.startAnimation(58);
  // Damage the target's HP.
  target.gainHp(-damage);
  // Check if the target is dead.
  if (target.isDead()) {
  // If the target is dead, make it collapse.
    target.performCollapse();
  }
}
</Custom Regenerate Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
this.startAnimation(244);
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Help Description>
Leeches HP at the end of every turn equal to 1/16th of this battler's MHP, capped at 1/5th of the origin's MHP.
</Help Description>

name: Biding
note:
<animationRow:12>

<Custom Apply Effect>
// Upon applying Bide, set the Bide damage to 0.
user._bide = 0;
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
// Check if the target took any HP damage.
if (target.result().hpDamage > 0) {
  // If the target did, raise the Bide damage by the HP damage taken.
  target._bide += target.result().hpDamage;
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
// Check if the party is in battle.
if ($gameParty.inBattle()) {
// Play animation 40 on the user.
user.startAnimation(40);
// Calculate the damage. The damage dealt is equal to 2x Bide damage.
var damage = Math.ceil(user._bide * 2);
// Get the group of alive enemies.
var enemies = user.opponentsUnit().aliveMembers();
// Loop through each of the enemies.
for (var i = 0; i < enemies.length; ++i) {
  // Get the enemy.
  var enemy = enemies[i];
  // Play animation 107 on the enemy.
  enemy.startAnimation(107);
  // Make the enemy take damage.
  enemy.gainHp(-damage);
  // Prompt the enemy's damage popup.
  enemy.startDamagePopup();
  // Clear the results of the enemy taking damage.
  enemy.clearResult();
  // Check if the enemy is dead.
  if (enemy.isDead()) {
    // If the enemy is dead, make it collapse.
    enemy.performCollapse();
  }
}
// Reset the Bide damage value.
user._bide = 0;

} // Check if the party is in battle.
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Help Description>
Cannot do anything. Once the state expires, the afflicted will deal damage to all enemies equal to 2x the damage received while biding.
</Help Description>

name: Paralyzed
note:
<Category: Electric>
<Category: debuff>
<Category: moderate debuff>

// Disables instant skills from paralyze as to not abuse the mechanic.
<Cancel Instant Skill: 1 to 2000>
<Cancel Instant Item: 1 to 2000>

<Custom Action Start Effect>
// Set the paralyze success rate.
var paralyzeRate = 0.25;
// Make a random number check to see if paralyze passes...
if (Math.random() < paralyzeRate) {
  // If it does, play the paralyze animation on the target.
  user.startAnimation(64);
  // Check for the user's current action...
  if (user.currentAction()) {
    // And make the user consume its resources.
    user.useItem(user.currentAction().item());
  }
  // Clear the user's actions making the user lose the actions.
  user.clearActions();
  // Get the log window from battle.
  var logWindow = SceneManager._scene._logWindow;
  // Check if the paralyze state has text in message 3
  if (state.message3) {
    // If it does, create a message based on it.
    var msg = user.name() + state.message3;
    // Add the text to the log window to display in battle.
    logWindow.addText(msg);
  }
  // Make the battle wait for the paralysis animation to finish playing.
  BattleManager.actionWaitForAnimation();
  // Clear the log window.
  logWindow.push('clear');
}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

<Help Description>
This battler has a 25% chance of not being able to move.
</Help Description>

name: Strength Within the Blade
note:
<animationRow:27>

<HP Life Steal Physical: +50%>

<Custom Confirm Effect>
// Registers the HP value of the user.
user._confirmHp = user.hp;
</Custom Confirm Effect>

<Custom Establish Effect>
// Check to see if the effect deals damage to HP and is a physical attack.
if (value > 0 && this.isHpEffect() && this.isPhysical()) {
  // Check to see if the user is at full HP.
  if (user.hp === user.mhp) {
    // Get the user's Life Steal results.
    var result = user.result();
    // Get the overheal amount.
    var overheal = -1 * result.hpDamage + user._confirmHp - user.mhp;
    // Check if the overheal amount is above 0.
    if (overheal > 0) {
      // Adds a barrier to the user based on the overheal amount.
      user.gainBarrier(overheal, 0);
      user.customPopup("+" + overheal, 3);
    }
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

<Help Description>
Increases physical lifesteal by 50%. Overhealed lifesteal is converted to a magical barrier.
</Help Description>

name: Lost Soul Cloak

</Custom Passive Condition>

<Custom React Effect>
if (target.hp - value < target.mhp / 2) {
  value = target.hp - target.mhp / 2;
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
if (target.hp <= target.mhp / 2) {
  target.startAnimation(60);
  target._svBattlerName = "NoMatchingSprite/Uncloaked Soul";
  target._svAttackAnimationId = 133;
  target._uncloaked = true;
  target.overrideArmorWeaknesses = [];
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

name: Conjurer's Harp
note:
<Category: Bypass Death Removal>
<Category: Bypass Recover All Removal>

<Custom Establish Effect>
var random = Math.random();
if (random < 0.4 && value > 0) {
  var toGain = Math.ceil(value * 0.08);
  target.startAnimation(140);

  var hp = [];
  for (i = 0; i < $gameParty.battleMembers().length; i++) { 
    const actor = [];
    if ($gameParty.battleMembers()[i].hpRate() !== 1 && !$gameParty.battleMembers()[i].isDead()) {
      actor.push($gameParty.battleMembers()[i].hpRate());
      actor.push(i);
      hp.push(actor);
    }
  }
  if (hp.length !== 0) {
    var sortedHp = hp.sort(function(b, a) { return b[0] - a[0]; });
    var selected = sortedHp[0];
    var id = selected[1];
    var subject = $gameParty.battleMembers()[id];
    
    subject.startAnimation(45);
    subject.gainHp(toGain);
    if (subject !== user) subject.customPopup("+" + toGain, 1);
    user.increaseTotalHealingDealt(toGain);
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

  case 1:
    target.addState(131);
    break;
  case 2:
    target.removeState(131);
    target.addState(132);
    break;
  case 3:
    target.removeState(132);
    target.addState(133);
    break;
  default:
    break;
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
target._offensiveStance = 0;
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: Fiery Harp
note:
<Category: Bypass Death Removal>
<Category: Bypass Recover All Removal>

<Custom Establish Effect>
var random = Math.random();
if (random < 0.6 && value > 0) {
  var toGain = Math.ceil(value * 0.12);
  target.startAnimation(140);

  var hp = [];
  for (i = 0; i < $gameParty.battleMembers().length; i++) { 
    const actor = [];
    if ($gameParty.battleMembers()[i].hpRate() !== 1 && !$gameParty.battleMembers()[i].isDead()) {
      actor.push($gameParty.battleMembers()[i].hpRate());
      actor.push(i);
      hp.push(actor);
    }
  }
  if (hp.length !== 0) {
    var sortedHp = hp.sort(function(b, a) { return b[0] - a[0]; });
    var selected = sortedHp[0];
    var id = selected[1];
    var subject = $gameParty.battleMembers()[id];
    
    subject.startAnimation(45);
    subject.gainHp(toGain);
    if (subject !== user) subject.customPopup("+" + toGain, 1);
    user.increaseTotalHealingDealt(toGain);
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: Watchful Gaze
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
target._watchfulGaze = target._watchfulGaze || 0;
target._watchfulGaze = Math.min(5, target._watchfulGaze + 1);
stack = target._watchfulGaze;
pool = DataManager.stateCategories['DEBUFF'];
if (stack > 1 && stack < 5) {
  for (i = 0; i < (stack - 1) * 2; i++) {
    target.addState(pool[Math.floor(Math.random() * pool.length)]);
  }
}
if (stack == 5) {
  target.gainHp(-Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER);
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
target._watchfulGaze = 0;
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Help Description>
Progressively applies more debuffs, eventually culminating in death. Gazes: \evalText<<this._battler._watchfulGaze>>.
</Help Description>
